original_text: There is nothing from without a man, that entering into him can defile him: but the things which come out of him, those are they that defile the man.
korean_text: 무엇이든지 밖에서 사람에게로 들어가는 것은 능히 사람을 더럽게 하지 못하되

sentences.original_text: There is nothing from without a man
sentences.korean_translation: 사람 밖에서 들어오는 것은 아무것도 없다

sentences.original_text: that entering into him can defile him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 들어가서 그를 더럽힐 수 있는

sentences.original_text: but the things which come out of him
those are they that defile the man
